updates.content:
We are seeing an increased number of calls timing out.

When we see a spike of timeouts we can see errors across different endpoints.

We are investigating the root cause of the issue and we'll report back as soon as possible.

We have found the root cause in a slow query that was bringing down the database for everyone.

We have limited the query duration and the status seems back to normal.

We are monitoring and trying to release a stable fix.
